name: Time to be a Hero
description:
A true RPG in your smartphone! Infinite quests, gear, artifacts, and terrifying monsters are waiting for you.

** Time to Be a Hero is optimized to work on iPhone 6, iPad Air, iPad mini 2 or later versions. You can try to launch it on older devices, yet we can’t guarantee the game will run smoothly and seamlessly.

BECOME THE LEGENDARY DRAGON.
Get one of the legendary Dragon masks, and become the mightiest hero of all the Necklace’s world. Defeat other heroes in the Arena of Champions and in the Grand Arena!

COLLECT ALL THE PERFECT GEAR.
You can get your hands on enormous amount of gear of various quality, but only perfect gear will grant you true power! Open chests in the Treasury and collect a full set of the best armor.

CRAFT UNIQUE ARTIFACTS.
Have you always dreamt of being a creator? Craft mighty artifacts, upgrade, and reforge gear in the Smithy!

EMBARK ON RAIDS WITH FRIENDS.
Join the best guild and defeat terrifying bosses along with your friends. Each boss requires expertise in tactics and a special gear, hero!

EXPLORE WORLDS OF THE NECKLACE.
Complete all storyline quests and find the mysterious Three Gods who wreaked havoc in your home world!
